name: Station Overseer
storyline: In Station Overseer, three people are sent out to build a new space station in the middle of an asteroid field. With the onboard AI being the player, they mine the nearby asteroids and construct buildings, machinery and relationships as their life progresses and they try to survive the harshness of space.
summary: A fantasy space station simulator with a storytelling emphasis, where the player is tasked with building a home among the stars. Witness the success and tragedy of the humans and aliens alike as the player helps them survive the cold harsh environment of outer space.
